Media Coverage / Research Highlights:

  • Our book "Developing Next-Generation Countermeasures for Homeland Security Threat Prevention" getting featured in Malaysia Daily Malaymail.
  • Media Coverage: Our book "Advances in Biometrics for Secure Human Authentication and Recognition" getting featured at Surveillance Systems.
  • Read the review on our book "Advances in Biometrics for Secure Human Authentication and Recognition".
  • My article "The 'New' Type of Identity Theft: Are You Secure?" getting featured as week's NewsBreaks article and the monthly NewsLink Spotlight in the New Jersey based news media Information Today, Inc.!
  • My article "The 'New' Type of Identity Theft: Are You Secure?" getting featured in IGI Global Newsroom.
  • Our book "Developing Next-Generation Countermeasures for Homeland Security Threat Prevention" getting featured at National Safety Council's Spotlight Titles for National Safety Month!
  • Our book "Advances in Biometrics for Secure Human Authentication and Recognition" getting featured in Annual Report of the Government Office for Science, UK.
